Yunmin

Korean: 윤민

Country:

South Korea

Full name:
Cho Yun-min
Native name:
조윤민
Birthday:
Sep 13, 1996
Age:
28 years old
Group (2020-present):
Touched

Introduction

Yunmin (윤민; or Yoon Min) is a South Korean singer-songwriter, guitarist and the vocalist of the rock band, Touched (터치드). She was also a contestant on the SBS 2012/2013 survival show, K-pop Star 2.

As the masked singer The Joys And Sorrows Also Count As Rock (희로애락도 락이다; or Rock Is In Every Emotion) in 2024, she became the first female contestant to win 9 consecutive times on MBC's variety show "King of Mask Singer". She is tied with Ha Hyun Woo of Guckkasten for having the longest winning streak out of all the contestants.

Fun facts

1
Yunmin performed "Wind That Blows" (by M.C THE MAX) and won her 8th consecutive win during episode 449 of MBC's variety show "King of Mask Singer" on May 5, 2024. She is now tied with Sonnet (Son Seungyeon) and Yang Yoseop (of Highlight) for having the second-longest winning streak out of all the contestants that have ever been on the show. With this win, she also became tied with Sonnet for having the longest winning streak out of all the female contestants.
…
2
Yunmin performed "Death Note" (The Musical OST by Hong Kwang Ho) and won during episode 439 of MBC's variety show "King of Mask Singer" on February 18, 2024.
…
3
Yunmin performed "Turtle Ship" (by Kim Jong Seo) and won her 9th consecutive win during episode 451 of MBC's variety show "King of Mask Singer" on May 19, 2024. She is now tied with Ha Hyun Woo (of Guckkasten) for having the longest winning streak out of all the contestants that have ever been on the show.
…
4
Yunmin was unmasked on MBC's variety show "King of Mask Singer" during episode 453 on June 2, 2024 after a vote of 47 to 52. She finished with the record of 9 consecutive wins, staying tied with Ha Hyun Woo (of Guckkasten) for having the longest winning streak out of all the contestants. Her final performance as the queen on the show was Lee Seung Chul's song "Amateur".
…
5
Yunmin became the 215th Generation Mask King/Queen on MBC's variety show "King of Mask Singer" after performing "The Dance in the Rhythm" (by Kim Wan Sun) with Kim Ga Hee, a self-composed song, "Please" (by Lee So Ra), and "Pianissimo" (by Cherryfilter) during episode 434 & 435 on January 14 & 21, 2024.
…
6
Yunmin performed "Do You Know" (by Jo Sung Mo) and won during episode 441 of MBC's variety show "King of Mask Singer" on March 3, 2024.
…
7
Yunmin performed "Creep" (by Radiohead), "Let It Be" (by The Beatles), and "I Need a Girl" (by Taeyang of BIGBANG) with Kim Sejeong during episode 3, 4, and 8 of the SBS survival show "K-Pop Star 2" in 2012/2013.
…
8
Yunmin was featured on Mingi's song "AUTOBAHN" and appeared in its music video. It was released on March 15, 2025 on YouTube as "[FIX OFF] Desire Project #2".
…
9
Yunmin performed "Moonflower" (by Lucia) and won her 7th consecutive win during episode 447 of MBC's variety show "King of Mask Singer" on April 21, 2024. With this win, she became tied with Seomoon Tak for having the third-longest winning streak out of all the contestants that have ever been on the show and the second-longest winning streak out of all the female contestants.
…
10
Yunmin performed "Thinking" (by Boohwal) and won her 6th consecutive win during episode 445 of MBC's variety show "King of Mask Singer" on March 31, 2024.
…
